tool_description: Global hyperlocal real-time air quality API for 1M+ postcodes. Test an API call. Get accurate & actionable air quality data.
name: Ambee Air Quality
title: Ambee Air Quality

api_list.name: By Coordinates
api_list.description: Get nearest places readings based around the given latitude and longitude

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of rows returned

api_list.name: By Postal Code
api_list.description: Check air quality for your postal code

required_parameters.name: postalCode
required_parameters.description: Postal code to display the air quality for

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of rows to be displayed

api_list.name: By City
api_list.description: Get the latest air quality data for your city

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: The name of the city for which you want the air quality

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: The number of rows to be returned

api_list.name: By Country
api_list.description: Provides the air quality data for a country

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: The international country code for the country you want the air quality for

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of rows to be returned

api_list.name: Weather
api_list.description: Get weather data for any place based on coordinates

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the coordinate to get the weather

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the coordinate to find the weather

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of rows to be returned
